xxl.core.xml.operators
Interface XMLDocumentMetaData

All Superinterfaces:
MetaDataProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLObject
public interface XMLDocumentMetaData
extends MetaDataProvider

Interface defining meta data for XML Documents. Standardized meta data entries are:

  • filename: associated filename with the document (for example the initial filename)
  • simplexpathlocation: allowed inside XPath expressions only: /, name, [number]

Method Summary
 Document getDocument()
          Returns the DOM-Document stored inside.
 Object getMetaData()
          Returns the meta data (here, an object of type Map has to be returned).
 Object getMetaDataEntry(String key)
          Returns a meta data entry or null, if no such entry exists.
 void putMetaDataEntry(String key, Object value)
          Sets a meta data entry with key and value.
 void setDocument(Document document)
          Sets the DOM-Document which is stored inside.

getMetaData

Object getMetaData()
Returns the meta data (here, an object of type Map has to be returned). Be careful with modifications, because the meta data is not copied (reference to the meta data!).

Specified by:
getMetaData in interface MetaDataProvider
Returns:
map containing all meta data.
